title: Weather App
description: A simple and responsive weather app offering real-time updates, temperature, conditions, humidity, and wind speed for any city.It ensures accurate and user-friendly weather tracking with dynamic icons and clear data presentation.

title: Eccomerce-Website
description: A modern and user-friendly e-commerce platform offering smooth navigation, secure payments, and a rich shopping experience with personalized recommendations. Built with technologies for fast, reliable, and responsive performance.
